eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN IMMEDIATE EVACUATION NOTICE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Smith, TX; AT 07:09 PM ON NOV 20, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 03:09 AM NOV 21, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A large commercial structure fire is active near HWY 64 and Toll 49.  Evacuate area immediately if near fire or within the smoke plume.  Hazardous air quality is imminent near location. Evacuate to Pleasant Retreat UMC, 417 County Road 1143.
